physical_appearance:This is a black-and-white portrait photograph. It features a couple
 standing poised leaning against a short column structure. The man on the left is wearing a hat
 a top with buttons down the front
 trousers
 and holding an umbrella in his right hand. The lady is dressed in a loose top and skirt
 and is holding a fan in her right hand
 and an umbrella in her left. The photograph is quite faded and stained. There are no inscriptions
 tears
 or folds seen.

sgcool_label_text:\This is part of a series of small carte de visite format portrait photographs by August Sachtler
 a German photographer who started photographing in Singapore in the early 1860s. The studio details inscribed on the back of these cartes de visite read \\A. Sachtler in Singapore\\

metadata.title_text: Series of six carte de visite portraits by August Sachtler Photograph of a Chinese couple
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a black-and-white portrait photograph. It features a couple, standing poised leaning against a short column structure. The man on the left is wearing a hat, a top with buttons down the front, trousers, and holding an umbrella in his right hand. The lady is dressed in a loose top and skirt, and is holding a fan in her right hand, and an umbrella in her left. The photograph is quite faded and stained. There are no inscriptions, tears, or folds seen.
metadata.subject_terms_1: indigenous people ways of life folk costume portraits
metadata.subject_terms_2: Carte de visite photographs Portrait photography Indigenous people Lifestyles Ethnic costume
metadata.sgcool_label_text: "This is part of a series of small carte de visite format portrait photographs by August Sachtler, a German photographer who started photographing in Singapore in the early 1860s. The studio details inscribed on the back of these cartes de visite read ""A. Sachtler in Singapore""
